attributes.action: Be considerate of the income of single parents when ema grants are concerned.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is difficult for single parents to support children in collage. so this is where the ema is used. but some parents are just above the poverty line and so there children recive little if any ema which makes life difficult for students of single parents. i propose that single parent income should be looked at in an alternate way to income drawn by both parents, allowing more ema for single parented children.
